title: Artcell
longDescription: Artcell is a progressive rock band formed in 1999 in Dhaka, Bangladesh. They are known for their intricate compositions and blend of various musical genres.

title: Aurtohin
shortDescription: Rock band with a unique sound
longDescription: Aurtohin is a renowned rock band in Bangladesh. They are known for their unique sound that combines rock with elements of folk and classical music.

title: Warfez
longDescription: Warfez is an experimental music group that pushes boundaries and explores new sounds. Their music is a fusion of various genres and is known for its innovative approach.

title: Shironamhin
shortDescription: Lyrically rich songs with a touch of melancholy
longDescription: Shironamhin is a band known for their emotionally charged and lyrically rich songs. Their music often explores themes of melancholy and introspection.

title: Arbovirus
shortDescription: Hard-hitting rock with socially relevant lyrics
longDescription: Arbovirus is a rock band with a reputation for hard-hitting music and socially relevant lyrics. They are known for their energetic performances and powerful stage presence.

title: Black
shortDescription: Dark and intense music with poetic lyrics
longDescription: Black is a band that creates dark and intense music with poetic lyrics. Their songs often delve into themes of love, loss, and existential introspection.
